programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: A Family Man's Exciting Fresh Start
programme.desc: Nick packed up his family and moved to Savannah to be closer to nature. But since the move, he hasn’t been able to disconnect from work. Kinga takes him away from his desk to explore what the great state of Georgia has to offer.

programme.title: Heroes On Call
programme.sub-title: Heroes On Call: The Forgotten Story of America's First Paramedics
programme.desc: In the 1960s, Americans were dying at shocking rates due to inadequate emergency care. Enter Freedom House Ambulance Service: the first paramedics unit in the U.S., run and staffed by Black men and women. This is the origin story of EMS.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Great (Lake) Escape to Erie, PA
programme.desc: Imbibe boozy bakes, set sail on a haunted cruise ship, and step back in time to Prohibition America in this great lake-side town.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Remix Dishes to Savor from the Midwest
programme.desc: Discover where classic dishes collide to create delightful flavors. From pizza debates to the Juicy Lucy to a good old-fashioned red beer, see how regional creativity transforms beloved foods into something more.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Grandmothers Pinky-Promise to Self Care
programme.desc: Karla, a devoted mother and doting grandmother has had her fair share of obstacles from two bouts of cancer to caring for her husband and daughter. Karla embarks on a much needed day of pampering, seeking solace and self-care.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Hanging Out in Homewood
programme.desc: Ed and Day travel to Homewood to see if they have what it takes to be urban beekeepers, elite barbers, and African dancers and drummers.

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Downtown Duels
programme.desc: Rob searches for secret rooms, blows off some steam and fire, and finds himself challenged to a duel when he ventures deep into Downtown Boston.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Oklahoma Girl Scout Murders
programme.desc: As Girl Scouts at Camp Scott settle into their tents one evening, eerie footsteps and distant cries haunt the campers throughout the night. The unsettling sounds turn out to be the echos one of the largest murder investigations in Oklahoma's history.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Huge Evidence Hauls Seen on the Force
programme.desc: Whether it’s gathering thousands of mysterious, colorful packets stuffed in a store’s ceiling or valuable wildlife slithering to freedom, investigators must be ready to decisively face a range of mammoth tasks in the field.

programme.title: Rickwood: The Soul of Birmingham
programme.sub-title: Rickwood: The Soul of Birmingham
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Daring Escapes From Custody
programme.desc: A look at daring escapes from custody and the breakouts that take on many forms – yet always involve finding and exploiting the weakest parts of the system.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: Blindfolded Batting Cage Blunder
programme.desc: Dreams come true while visiting a long-time fan and cancer survivor on their way to Louisville. Ryan wears a blindfold during a batting cage challenge with Jimmy, and a couple living behind the batting cage receive help getting back on their feet.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Date Night Delights
programme.desc: Chefs Jason Taylor and Adam Stayrook will have to chef to impress in today’s Date Night Delights challenge. Will their fancy meals delight the judges? Or will this be a date they wanna forget?

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot: Lifestyle Blogger, Male Model, & Reality TV Star Shout Out Top Spots
programme.desc: Our KC experts include a Savage X Fenty model who also walks his own line, an MTV star who's turning carnivores on to the #plantlife and a local blogger with the scoop on where to let your dog off-leash while enjoying an adult beverage.

programme.title: Stitch
programme.sub-title: Stitch: Road Trip
programme.desc: Take a trip to see some unique destinations across the country.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Miya Marcano Story
programme.desc: When homesick college student Miya Marcano books a flight to south Florida for the weekend, her family is thrilled. But when the plane lands, Miya is nowhere to be found.

programme.title: Absolutely Albuquerque
programme.sub-title: Absolutely Albuquerque : Maker's Day
programme.desc: Amanda teams up with creative dynamo Jesse Littlebird at the renowned Indian Pueblo Cultural Center. They embark on a vibrant journey through Albuquerque's thriving Indigenous art scene and celebrate the city's most innovative makers.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Alien Surprises in Roswell, NM
programme.desc: Embark on an out-of-this-world journey to Roswell, New Mexico! Unveil intriguing alien mysteries, order from a McDonald's with a secret menu and stay the night in a Cold War missile bunker. Don't miss this extraordinary adventure!

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: The Odd Couple Survive the Outdoors
programme.desc: Meet Gary and Karen, he’s a little adventurous, and she’s a little stay-at-home, but it will all change after 12 years of marriage. Kinga, Gary, and Karen embark on a crash course in adventure through the Granite State.

programme.title: Human Race by Runner's World
programme.sub-title: Human Race By Runner’s World, Vol 2
programme.desc: Runner-in-Chief Jeff Dengate, presents inspiring runner stories from around the country. Meet runners from Colorado, New Jersey, Kentucky and Pennsylvania who are making a difference.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It!: Deep Dish Teacher Squares Off Against Lawyer Turned Pasta-Preneur
programme.desc: Former teacher Craig Falk is hitting the (cook)books against former lawyer Laurie Boucher. Which of these second-career chefs best showcases their culinary skills to craft the perfect packed lunch?

programme.title: Chronicle: Quip Town
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) An all-access look at the Aliquippa high school football team's journey to repeat as state champions, from training camp through the season, all while battling numerous obstacles.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Unexpected Eats with Midwest Flair
programme.desc: Uncover the Midwest's unexpected. From quirky to inventive flavor mash-ups like the bulgogi burger to the questionable sour cream & raisin pie, see how the area crafts some interesting but delightful culinary concoctions.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Women's Day: Nurturing Nurse Steps Up To The Front Line For A Day Full Of Surprises
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Comedians, podcasters and craft beer enthusiasts Ed Bailey and Day Bracey explore hot spots, hidden gems and the best places to grab a cold brew in the 'Burgh.

programme.title: In Transit by Esquire
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Host Dave Holmes meets celebrity guests at the airport bar to discuss must-do activities in cities across America. So when you’re ready to board your next flight, you’ll have an Esquire-approved itinerary.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: In this game show, comedian Frank Nicotero hits the streets to ask people questions inspired by the wildest news stories for a chance at winning a cash prize. These real-life stories with unreal outcomes will make you say, “Wait, What Happened?"

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Local radio personality, Greg Adams, wants to shine a light on all parts of his beloved city and prove that Milwaukee has a lot more to offer than people might expect. In each episode, Greg is joined by a notable personality from the community who shows him their favorite spots and the best ways to experience them.

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join New Hampshire-based band Recycled Percussion as they perform acts of kindness in their community, and across the country. In each episode, you'll witness the great lengths and hilarious things they're willing to do in the name of kindness.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Chronicle: Slice of the 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2023) An exploration into what makes Pittsburgh’s pizza scene so special, and the impact pizza shops have on their communities.

programme.title: Ballin' in Baltimore
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Join WNBA player and Olympian Angel McCoughtry as she shows us the people and places that put Baltimore on the map. From sailing the Chesapeake, to sampling street foods, McCoughtry pulls back the curtain on what makes the Charm City so special.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Each episode of this documentary series features incredible sports stories from iconic American cities. From gritty underdog victories to passionate unlikely match-ups, the series proves that sports are so much more than a pastime.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Embark on amazing adventures across America with host Kinga Philipps who takes locals out of their comfort zones to experience transformation in the great outdoors.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Local Love
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: One local single experiences some of the best their city has to offer on three blind dates. Our singles may spend three perfect days out on the town, but there can only be one love match. Who will be picked for a second date?

programme.title: Hit Me With Your Best Spot
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: No one knows a city like the locals who live there. This series taps into the insider knowledge of notable figures including musicians, athletes, chefs, artists, influencers, and others who share their best spots to hit up in the city.

programme.title: West By Orphan Train
programme.sub-title: West by Orphan Train
programme.desc: A gripping documentary uncovering real stories of children loaded on trains, sent west, and presented “for the picking.” From 1854 to 1929, over 6,000 children landed in Iowa communities. Discover their emotional journeys and impact on the Midwest.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Underdog Uprising
programme.sub-title: Underdog Uprising
programme.desc: Every game day, fans pour into the stands to cheer on New Mexico's soccer team. But these are no ordinary supporters. From the Curse, to Sektor 114, to the Black Diamonds these fans are making New Mexico United.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Grisly Discovery on the Gulf Coast
programme.desc: When body parts wash ashore in the Gulf Coast over several days in 2012, investigators must identify the victim before they can find the killers. Even then, justice is elusive.
